segments.text: What qualifications should a reporter have ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: As a reporter , he must have acute insight and language skills . At the same time , he must have good judgment , the respect for his job and tactical cooperation with others .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Can you work under pressure ? You know , people working here are all busy everyday since we're daily newspaper .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I think I've got used to work under pressure . I will adjust myself to the step of your newspaper quickly .
segments.speaker: S2
